channel.title: CVE Feed for rjbs -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for rjbs -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-4140|2024-05-02T22:26:18.827Z -- rjbs -- email-mime
item.description: An excessive memory use issue (CWE-770) exists in Email-MIME, before version 1.954, which can cause denial of service when parsing multipart MIME messages. The patch set (from 2020 and 2024) limits excessive depth and the total number of parts.
